question: After being involved in an accident, you were looked after by a person you did not know before. Write a special thank you letter to express your gratitude.In your letter:Introduce yourself and let him/her know why you are writingExpress your appreciationAnd offer him/ her to visit your home with this family.
text: I hope this letter finds you in the pink of your health.

My name is James, and I am writing this letter to you to express my sincere and heartfelt thanks for lending a helping hand during my time of need. Last month, you saved me by taking me to the hospital from a grave accident at Triplicane.

Since I was unconscious for 3 days I did not realize that you were the one who looked after me. It was only last week while conversing with my friend Arun, who mentioned you. He did say that you were by my side all the while, and only left after ensuring he was with me. I would like to Thank you from the bottom of my heart for saving me. If it weren't for you, I couldn't imagine the outcome.

I got your address from the hospital register  but did not find a phone number or address. Since I am still bed-ridden and cannot walk, it will be difficult for me to travel. However, I would love to have you and your family come over to my house, thus get a chance to meet and Thank you in person. My family members are eager to meet you as well.
I will be really glad if you can make it a point to visit us, otherwise please do not hesitate to contact me. My address and phone number are mentioned below.
